meanings.definition: A single distinct meaningful element of speech or writing, used with others (or sometimes alone) to form a sentence and typically shown with a space on either side when written.
meanings.sent1: She carefully chose her words before speaking.
meanings.sent2: His words were filled with kindness and encouragement.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked puzzled when the dog tried to speak in words.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a soothing melody to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's words painted a vivid picture in the students' minds.

meanings.definition: Something that someone says or writes; a remark or piece of information.
meanings.sent1: His words left a lasting impact on the audience.
meanings.sent2: The words in the book transported her to a magical world.
meanings.sent3: The words on the sign made everyone laugh out loud.
meanings.sent4: Her words were a beacon of hope in a sea of despair.
meanings.sent5: The words of the wise elder resonated deeply with the young listeners.
